page.title: 20WATER WHEEL AND GOOD-BYE
page.content:
water wheels are the only relics of an industrious past on the Clady River. The water wheel is at present in full working order,due entirely to the efforts of Mr.Scott and his family,who have maintained the wheel and indeed use it,to provide electricity in their home. {GOOD_BYE Good_bye from the children of 1985, In 100 yrs from now we won't be alive. We hope we live on in this Disk we have made, And thoughts of Loanends will never ever fade.
{WE HAVE RECORDED OUR PAST,OUR PRESENT {AND THUS YOUR PAST. {PLEASE LOOK AFTER YOUR FUTURE!
